lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bankers could not back down either because they would have had to sacrifice millions of dollars in profits and may have thrown the door open to other debtors, notably Argentina and Brazil, to claim even finer spreads than Mexico's.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Ongpin said the country should not have a financing gap before the end of next year at the earliest, depending on the success of the Philippine Investment Note issues which are planned, but some bankers say they are already braced for new loan requests for 1988 and 1989.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The prepayments, although modest, were not apparently something that the Philippine negotiators wanted to dwell upon as they sought to portray their 17-year rescheduling agreement as better than Mexico's.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bankers could not back down either because they would have had to sacrifice millions of dollars in profits and may have thrown the door open to other debtors, notably Argentina and Brazil, to claim even finer spreads than Mexico's.

lst.str: Ongpin said the country should not have a financing gap before the end of next year at the earliest, depending on the success of the Philippine Investment Note issues which are planned, but some bankers say they are already braced for new loan requests for 1988 and 1989.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The prepayments, although modest, were not apparently something that the Philippine negotiators wanted to dwell upon as they sought to portray their 17-year rescheduling agreement as better than Mexico's.
